schemas.advertiser:
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/schema",
  "type": "object",
  "properties":
  {
    "AdvID":        { "type": "integer", "format": "id"      , "required": true                        },
    "MID":          { "type": "integer", "format": "id"      , "required": true                        },
    "name":         { "type": "string" , "format": "name"    , "required": true                        },
    "email":        { "type": "string" , "format": "email"   , "required": true                        },
    "password":     { "type": "string" , "format": "password", "required": true                        },
    "variables":    { "type": "string"                                                                 },
    "editPassword": { "type": "string" ,                       "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ]  },
    "sparkkey":     { "type": "string" ,                       "required": true                        },
    "advSparkID":   { "type": "integer", "format": "id"                                                },
    "addbanners":   { "type": "string" ,                       "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ]  },
    "deleted":      { "type": "string" ,                       "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ]  },
    "deletedDate":  { "type": "string" , "format": "datetime", "required": true                        }
  }
}

schemas.campaign:
{
    "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/schema",
    "type": "object",
    "properties":
    {
        "CID":          { "type": "integer", "format": "id"          , "required": true                       },
        "AdvID":        { "type": "integer", "format": "id"          , "required": true                       },
        "MID":          { "type": "integer", "format": "id"          , "required": true                       },
        "targetID":     { "type": "integer", "format": "id"          , "required": true                       },
        "name":         { "type": "string" , "format": "campaignName", "required": true                       },
        "size":         { "type": "string" , "format": "size"        , "required": true                       },
        "isTextAdCamp": { "type": "string" ,                           "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ] },
        "has_popup":    { "type": "string" ,                           "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ] },
        "deleted":      { "type": "string" ,                           "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ] },
        "deletedDate":  { "type": "string" , "format": "datetime"    , "required": true                       }
    }
}

application/json.schema:
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/schema",
  "type": "object",
  "properties":
  {
    "AdvID":        { "type": "integer", "format": "id"      , "required": true                        },
    "MID":          { "type": "integer", "format": "id"      , "required": true                        },
    "name":         { "type": "string" , "format": "name"    , "required": true                        },
    "email":        { "type": "string" , "format": "email"   , "required": true                        },
    "password":     { "type": "string" , "format": "password", "required": true                        },
    "variables":    { "type": "string"                                                                 },
    "editPassword": { "type": "string" ,                       "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ]  },
    "sparkkey":     { "type": "string" ,                       "required": true                        },
    "advSparkID":   { "type": "integer", "format": "id"                                                },
    "addbanners":   { "type": "string" ,                       "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ]  },
    "deleted":      { "type": "string" ,                       "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ]  },
    "deletedDate":  { "type": "string" , "format": "datetime", "required": true                        }
  }
}

resources.description: List of Campaigns for the Advertiser.
A specific Campaign from the Advertiser.

application/json.schema:
{
    "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/schema",
    "type": "object",
    "properties":
    {
        "CID":          { "type": "integer", "format": "id"          , "required": true                       },
        "AdvID":        { "type": "integer", "format": "id"          , "required": true                       },
        "MID":          { "type": "integer", "format": "id"          , "required": true                       },
        "targetID":     { "type": "integer", "format": "id"          , "required": true                       },
        "name":         { "type": "string" , "format": "campaignName", "required": true                       },
        "size":         { "type": "string" , "format": "size"        , "required": true                       },
        "isTextAdCamp": { "type": "string" ,                           "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ] },
        "has_popup":    { "type": "string" ,                           "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ] },
        "deleted":      { "type": "string" ,                           "required": true, "enum": [ "0", "1" ] },
        "deletedDate":  { "type": "string" , "format": "datetime"    , "required": true                       }
    }
}
